official_title: To designate the bridge over lock and dam numbered 4 on the Arkansas River as the "Lawrence Blackwell Memorial Bridge".

summary.text: Designates the bridge over lock and dam numbered 4 on the Arkansas River, Arkansas, as the Lawrence Blackwell Memorial Bridge.
